name: Time and Hours Calculator
description: Time calculator allows you to add and subtract hours but also to divide and multiply hours by a given number. You can operate with hours, minutes and seconds.  Once a computation is completed by pressing Equals button, you will find the record in history. Also the history can be cleared at any time.   The app has two themes: Blue and Dark. Choose the one that best suits you.  You can use the button Now to introduce the current time in the calculator.  Any feedback is welcomed.
